const response = await client.indices.create({
  index: "idx",
  mappings: {
    _source: {
      mode: "synthetic",
    },
    properties: {
      ip: {
        type: "ip",
      },
    },
  },
});
console.log(response);

const response1 = await client.index({
  index: "idx",
  id: 1,
  document: {
    ip: [
      "192.168.0.1",
      "192.168.0.1",
      "10.10.12.123",
      "2001:db8::1:0:0:1",
      "::afff:4567:890a",
    ],
  },
});
console.log(response1);
